body:
Hey Guys,

I decided to host a proper, formal UHC event. I have made the decision to grab a few mates of mine from school to participate and they have all agreed now I am searching players on Avicus. If you want to participate, all you have to do is fill out some information and I will instantly add you, all people are willing to join. No, It isn't like staff applications where they decide of you are good enough, you could be the biggest noob and I will still add you to the list. We will have 8 teams of 4 players so 32 participant will be required.

Here is the information you must fill out:

IGN:
Timezone:
Where you live:
Skype:
Email: (optional)
How active:

If you have any questions or concerns, contact me on either Skype (sheamusplaysmc) or email me at drfrankensheamus@gmail.com and i will respond to it ASAP.

Current roster (Not the official teams yet):

- sheamus4414
-1benjoe
- Cheyo
- Jas_Hong
- rilomilo9


You could be next on the list...
Well hope to see you there, I will talk to everyone about the time and date of the event!
